document.full_text: representative peter t. king, whose committee is holding hearings on the radicalization of american muslims, once fervently supported a terrorist group, the irish republican army.
document.title: for lawmaker examining terror, a pro-i.r.a. past
lines_and_colors: representative peter t. king, whose committee is holding hearings on the radicalization of american muslims, once fervently supported a terrorist group, the irish republican army.
